note.p: German physician and psychiatrist. Studied medicine in Halle, 1796–1800; GP in Bielefeld. Professor of clinical medicine, Halle, 1815; Bonn, 1819. Studied psychosomatic interactions in illness, and the social and ethical aspects of medicine. Editor of Zeitschrift für psychische Ärzte, 1818–26; of Zeitschrift für die Beurtheilung und Heilung krankhafter Seelenzustände, with Maximilian Jacoby, from 1838.
